values.help: To configure if other radio recivers from Merten should be switched as well.
values.label: Switching additional CONNECT radio receivers

values.help: To configure the time the motor waits before switching direction.
values.label: Changeover delay (motor protection)

values.help: To configure input 1 of the raising time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
values.label: Raising time input 1

values.help: To configure input 1 of the raising time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
values.label: Raising time input 2

values.help: To configure input 1 of the lowering time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
values.label: Lowering time input 1

values.help: To configure input 1 of the lowering time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
values.label: Lowering time input 2

values.help: To configure use of light sensor. Default: 0 .
values.label: Light sensor

values.help: To configure brightness threshold for light sensor.
values.label: Brightness threshold for light sensor

values.help: To configure input 1 of reaction threshold for raising shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
values.label: Sensor raising reaction threshold input 1

values.help: To configure input 2 of reaction threshold for raising shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
values.label: Sensor raising reaction threshold input 1

values.help: To configure input 1 of reaction threshold for lowering shutter time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
